content: The Apramana Bat is a massive golden bat that is quite troublesome to fight. This boss frequently launches itself up into the air, crashing back down on you to deal massive damage. It also has an air slice attack where it beats its wings, creating blades of air that rocket toward you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Apramana_Bat_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Apramana Bat Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Apramana Bat Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Apramana Bat is a massive golden bat that is quite troublesome to fight. This boss frequently launches itself up into the air, crashing back down on you to deal massive damage. It also has an air slice attack where it beats its wings, creating blades of air that rocket toward you.
